name: Bleak Frontier
description:
Bleak Frontier is a strategy / city builder game set in a frozen wasteland in the far future, 4087 AD. As the chosen leader of the first permanent settlement in almost a century, you must guide the last survivors of the human race towards an uncertain future.



  • SURVIVE a vast frozen wasteland in the far future, 4087 AD.
  • FOUND a new civilization using a mysterious artifact.
  • BUILD a variety of different structures across multiple distinct eras



  • EXPAND your territory to harvest new resources.
  • RESEARCH technologies to improve your structures.
  • DEFEND against raider attacks with defensive structures and fortifications



  • MOBILIZE convoys to defend your towns, attack raider camps, and explore ancient ruins.
  • SALVAGE vehicles, survivors and resources from the wastes.
  • COLLECT powerful artifacts and learn Earth's forgotten history.

  • LISTEN to the original soundtrack composed by synthwave producer Rogue VHS.
